title: SMALL ISLAND: Cozy Humor Mystery with Cat
description: "A chuckle on every page!" ~ReviewerNothing's ever as it seems in Ohia, Maui, especially for me, Kat Smith. I'm Secret Service, not Postal Service, stuck in the back end of paradise and making the best of it when the grasping plans of a developer threaten to take out our small town. Even the evil post office cat, Tiki, is outraged by the hostile takeover of our “small island.” Meanwhile, someone's out there whacking the bad guys. Literally.I have to find a way to help, or I might lose the place and people I'm coming to love.If you like the Miss Fortune series, you'll love Kat and her clue crew on Maui! “This series is my new addiction!”~ Reviewer
author: Toby Neal
